title: Den of Devils
description: Congratulations and Welcome to the Den of Monsters, where pleasure is infinite.I hope you enjoy your captivity, but before sweet rounds of pleasure...is immense pain.My name is Esm√©ralda Bellerose and I'm a survivor of the Masquerade of Sin.Reunited with my Devils, I wait for my next grand journey.Thanks to my unexpected survival and completion of my sweet initiation, those who loved my story have requested another.How generous of my royal spectators? Are you sure you can handle the truth of our world?You're cordially invited to enter my world of sinful monsters but be warned.This isn't the dreamy tale that many of you may believe.With rushed endings, comes true beginnings, and with this invitation, those who preordered will be the first to unravel the truth of our dark oasis.Until then, click the right button and wait for what's to come. The true blurb and our grand reveal will display another world of seductive wonder.And with patience, you'll be captivated by our sinful deeds in the heart of Boston.
author: Avery Song
